name: Plausible-Analytics
longDescription: Plausible Analytics is an easy to use, lightweight (< 1 KB), open source and privacy-friendly alternative to Google Analytics. It doesnâ€™t use cookies and is fully compliant with GDPR, CCPA and PECR. You can self-host or have us run Plausible for you in the cloud. Here's the live demo of our own website stats.
